text: Mba khesharigi gumgi, mbe ruaŋruaŋgi sɨgi fara muuŋgiap, mbe ndɨkndɨgi ki fhuvara, mbe fhura shɨshɨga rui. Mbe ruaŋruaŋgi sɨgi fara muuŋgi guma, mbe fhura ana suirav, ana shogirim, ana rimgirga. Mbe kakagi bigi, mbe fhura buni mbatɨgir nta nzuai. Mbe mba sɨgi mbarɨgi tɨvara Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra mba tɨvara mben muuŋgirim, mbe mbatɨgirga.
